channel.title: [URGENT] Mulitple teleports
channel.description:
1. How can I make it so that when you click a city teleport it gives you multiple options then "more options" then it opens up a new page with more options?: (I.E: ***** ***** ***** ***** more options... *New page opens* ***** ***** ***** ***** *****)
2. How do I make the teleports that say "Varrock Teleport" to " Monster Teleport"?
